head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FERBER, ANDREW H.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FERBER, ANDREW H.

block.p: FERBER--Andrew H., of Bronxville on March 30, 2007. Beloved Husband of Carol Makovich, father of James, son of Jerome and Rosalind Ferber. Andy was an attorney for the NYS Court System. A memorial is scheduled at the Fred H. McGrath & Son Funeral Home, Bronxville, between the hours of 1 to 3 pm, Sunday April 22, with remembrances at 2 pm. In lieu of flowers, the family requests donations be made to the American Heart Association.
